bug.author: ZOUYIyi
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
OpenVINO => 2019.r2 Operating System / Platform => Windows 10 64 Bit Compiler => Visual Studio 2015 Problem classification: Model inference Framework: TensorFlow (if applicable) Model name: unet
I have converted the model from kerase to .pb then to .xml .bin I successfully run the model in c++ with openvino but the result of c ++ is different than the python result I find that in python I send the image range (0ï¼Œ1) but in c++ I send image range(0,255) I want to send float to blob when I use function : matU8ToBlob<uint8_t> ,it works ok with image range(0,255) I change it to matU8ToBlob < float > but it always failed when I put my image in it , <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Issue submission checklist</denchmark-h>
I report the issue, it's not a question
I checked the problem with documentation, FAQ, open issues, Stack Overflow, etc and have not found solution
There is reproducer code and related data files: images, videos, models, etc.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZOUYIyi>@ZOUYIyi</denchmark-link>
Please install the latest OpenVINO 2021.1 build and give it a try on that. First, I would suggest to re-convert your .pb model over to IR format (bin/xml) with Model Optimizer from 2021.1 package and then test the resulted IR model with one of your images via the Python Benchmark app - <denchmark-link:https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/2020.3/_inference_engine_tools_benchmark_tool_README.html>https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/2020.3/_inference_engine_tools_benchmark_tool_README.html</denchmark-link>
A command should be like
python3 benchmark_app.py -m -i
Closing, please re-open if additional assistance is needed.
